tool_description: Calculates estimated FOIA processing fees based on requester category, scope of request, and agency fee schedules.

agency_name.description: Name of the agency for fee schedule lookup

requester_category.description: Requester type: individual, media, academic, commercial, nonprofit

estimated_pages.description: Estimated number of pages to be reviewed

estimated_search_hours.description: Estimated hours of search time required

estimated_review_hours.description: Estimated hours of review time required

error_messages: Invalid requester category: Use one of [individual, media, academic, commercial, nonprofit].
Agency fee schedule not found: The specified agency is not in the fee database.
Invalid hour estimates: Search and review hours must be positive numbers.
Invalid page estimate: Estimated pages must be a positive integer.
usage: Provide agency_name, requester_category, and estimated_pages. Optionally specify estimated search and review hours for more accurate calculations. Returns detailed fee breakdown and total estimated cost.

free_hours_used.description: Number of free hours available to this requester category

billable_hours.description: Hours that will be billed after free allowance
